articles.author: Gregorio Sorgi, Jacopo Barigazzi, Giovanna Faggionato
articles.title: EU slams the door on US in colossal defense plan - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: Bloc aims to build up military-industrial complex to deter Russia and brace for the U.S. shift away from Europe.
articles.content: The danger of relying too much on the U.S. was highlighted by Trumps sudden decision to undermine allied Ukraine by halting arms deliveries and intelligence-sharing to pressure Kyiv into accepting pe… [+1134 chars]
